page.title: 01THE BRIDGWATER AREA
page.content: The area covered by this block depicts the industrial, commercial and rural nature of Bridgwater. It is a busy market town with one very large factory, which is the major employer for the area. At the time of this survey several major changes are taking place .A new{shopping precinct is in the process of construction and {new roads}are being built to ease the} traffic congestion in the town centre. Several of the town's established industries have closed during recent years and smaller industries, employing up to a dozen people, are opening up on the two industrial estates on the outskirts. The annual{Carnival}is watched by people who travel from all parts parts of the country and the skill and artistry of the various "gangs" is greatly admired by all.
